SubjectRegulations Amending the Shipsâ€™ Stores Regulations (Canadian Coast Guard)
PrecisRegulations Amending the SHIPS' STORES REGULATIONS (Canadian Coast Guard) in order to provide federal excise tax relief for fuel purchased for use in Canadian Coast Guard vessels proceeding outside Canada. This amendment will be retroactive to April 1, 2008.
